select e.employee_code from pb2_ext_hr_employee e inner join pb2_ext_res_users u ON u.login = e.employee_code inner join pb2_ext_res_groups_users_rel g ON g.uid = u.id inner join pb2_ext_ir_model_data ir ON ir.res_id = g.gid where ir.module = 'purchase' and ir.name = 'group_purchase_user' and e.org_id = #{orgId}

SELECT HR.employee_code
FROM pb2_ext_hr_employee HR INNER JOIN pb2_ext_res_users USR ON USR.login = HR.employee_code INNER JOIN pb2_ext_res_groups_users_rel GU ON GU.uid = USR.id INNER JOIN pb2_ext_ir_model_data IR ON IR.res_id = GU.gid WHERE IR.module = 'account' and IR.name = 'group_account_user'

select e.id, e.name_related, lpad(e.employee_code, 6 ,'0') as employee_code, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.work_phone, e.mobile_phone, concat('[',trim(o.code),'] ', o.name) org_desc, o.name org_name, s.id section_id, concat('[',trim(s.code),'] ', s.name) section_desc, s.name section_name, d.name div_name, coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'hr.employee,first_name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.id), e.first_name) as first_name_th, coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'hr.employee,last_name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.id), e.last_name) as last_name_th, concat('[',trim(o.code),'] ', coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'res.org,name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.org_id), o.name)) as org_desc_th, concat('[',trim(s.code),'] ', coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'res.section,name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.section_id), s.name)) as section_desc_th, coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'res.division,name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = d.id), d.name) as div_name_th, coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'hr.position,name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.position_id), po.name) as position_th, po.name "position", coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'res.partner.title,name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.title_id), t.name) as title_th, t.name title, e.section_id, e.org_id from pb2_ext_hr_employee e left join pb2_ext_res_org o on e.org_id = o.id left join pb2_ext_hr_position po on e.position_id = po.id left join pb2_ext_res_partner_title t on e.title_id = t.id left join pb2_ext_res_section s on e.section_id = s.id left join pb2_ext_res_division d on d.id = s.division_id where lpad(e.employee_code, 6 ,'0')=lpad(#{code}, 6 ,'0')
